Html: I downloaded this tool for Microsoft Office Word 2010, and it didn't install.  Can you get this code working for Word 2010 please, and make an available download?
What was the error you received? Did it fail to install, or install but fail to run?

Install dies.  Hope this helps.

I am running:

  1. Windows 7 (64 bit)
  2. Office 2010 Professional (32 bit)
  3. Visual Studio 2010 Ultimate
  4. I am local administrator on my machine.

Error message is:

"Component Visual Studio Tools for the Office system 3.0 Runtime Service Pack 1 has failed to install with the following error message:
"This action is only valid for products that are currently installed. "

The following components were successfully installed:
- .NET Framework Client Profile

The following components failed to install:
- Visual Studio Tools for the Office system 3.0 Runtime Service Pack 1

See the setup log file located at 'C:\Users\fred\AppData\Local\Temp\VSDA9A0.tmp\install.log' for more information"

Can  you try reinstalling the runtime from here (http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/en/details.aspx?FamilyId=54EB3A5A-0E52-40F9-A2D1-EECD7A092DCB&displaylang=en) and letting me know if it succeeds or not?
